description: Triangle giving a(n,r) = number of equivalence classes of Boolean functions of n variables and range r=0..2^n under action of symmetric group.
references: M. A. Harrison, Introduction to Switching and Automata Theory. McGraw Hill, NY, 1965, p. 147.
links: Index entries for sequences related to Boolean functions
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Feb 04 2000
